mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.oa_task_id AS "oaTaskId", a.title AS "title", a.content AS "content", a.files AS "files", a.send_user_id AS "sendUserId", a.rece_user_id AS "receUserId", a.send_date AS "sendDate", a.read_flag AS "readFlag", a.read_date AS "readDate", a.forward_flag AS "forwardFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.complete_flag AS "completeFlag"
